markdown.markdown: ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE} library(reactable) library(googlesheets4) library(googleAuthR) library(tidyverse) ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE} df_ux_telkom <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jdzxLszCltBIudkOe6usxMLQwFZpIUU3fDdwvSyc7Q0", range = "Telkom Digital Amoeba - UX Researcher") ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE} df_ux_telkom <- df_ux_telkom |> mutate(`Total Time (hour)` = round(`Total Time (hour)`, digits = 2)) df_ux_telkom <- df_ux_telkom |> filter(State %in% c("in_progress", "completed")) df_ux_telkom <- df_ux_telkom |> filter(`Batch VIX` %in% c("May", "June")) df_ux_telkom_clean <- df_ux_telkom[ , c("Name", "Email", "Phone Number", "Batch VIX", "State", "Advance Task Submission File 1", "Total Score", "Total Time (hour)")] ``` ```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE} sticky_style <- list(backgroundColor = "#f7f7f7") reactable(df_ux_telkom_clean, wrap = FALSE, resizable = TRUE, bordered = TRUE, defaultSorted = list(`Batch VIX` = "asc", `State` = "asc", `Total Score` = "desc", `Total Time (hour)` = "asc"), filterable = TRUE, fullWidth = TRUE, defaultPageSize = 50, minRows = 10, columns = list(`Advance Task Submission File 1` = colDef(html = TRUE, cell = function(value, index) { sprintf('%s', df_ux_telkom_clean$`Advance Task Submission File 1`[index], value) }) )) ```
